titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I received the Holy Communion in S. Gregory's Chapel at 8 a.m. I attended Mattins and Evensong: wrote great part of a sermon for Sunday: and attended a special meeting of Universities Lodge. The proceedings at the latter went on for more than two hours.
George came to re–arrange books, and stayed for lunch. I had no letters of any interest; and wrote none of any importance.
